itunes:title: This Is the Old Testament Week 4 with Ginny Owens
title: This Is the Old Testament Week 4 with Ginny Owens
description:
Join Raechel and Amanda for a conversation about the Old Testament with singer, songwriter, author, and teacher Ginny Owens. While discussing books of Wisdom Literature and the Prophetic book of Isaiah, the three remind one another of God’s good gifts to us, from the song book of Psalms and the hope of Isaiah, to Central Park as a blurry glimpse of heaven. Whatever season you find yourself in, join Raechel, Amanda, and Ginny in rejoicing in God’s presence through His Word, trusting that the same God seen in the pages of Scripture is the same God in and with His people today.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 4 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Old Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 


Shop the This Is the Old Testament Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 


Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-old-testament-week-4-with-ginny-owens/
content:encoded:

While discussing books of Wisdom Literature and the Prophetic book of Isaiah, the three remind one another of God’s good gifts to us, from the song book of Psalms and the hope of Isaiah, to Central Park as a blurry glimpse of heaven. Whatever season you find yourself in, join Raechel, Amanda, and Ginny in rejoicing in God’s presence through His Word, trusting that the same God seen in the pages of Scripture is the same God in and with His people today.
